++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7032038149190651141?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Process Video] | [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7032039086781222150?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 Loop Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6502 SCP-6502]
[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6502loop.mp4, 6502.gif
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7032039086781222150?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6502 by bigslothonmyface
[[/<]]
-----
For various reasons, this is probably gonna be the last one of these I do. At least for quite a while. But I think it turned out well anyway. It's a bit simpler than the other ones I've done but I think it's fitting. This is definitely an incredible article. Very emotionally impactful with no room for comfort.

I wanted the colors to reflect that. At first, I was going to have the background go deeper and deeper underground with the coffin at the bottom but it just didn't feel right. It just wasn't lonely enough.

That's the kind of vibe it needed to give off.
 
+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
